metadata.title: CVE-2020-0465 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In various methods of hid-multitouch.c, there is a possible out of boundswrite due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-162844689References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required
